Summary: Large forward beam of light, like a train. Two lights on the body with a flashing light between, not red and white. No sound!
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Granby
There were no other sightings in Granby on or around January 2nd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI stepped outside to look at the stars and I saw a beem of light being projected from a flying object. I could not imagine what it was. As I watched it come closer I could see it had two lights on the body with a flashing light inbetween. The color of the lights were kind of amber. It did not have red and white flashing lights, FAA regs. It was flying in a straight line.I could see a jet flying in the background and I could faintly hear the jet sound, but this object that was closer made no sound that I could hear. I live in the mountains and it was a quiet nite. I can't tell you how high or how far it was but I can say it was defintly over my valley. I should have heard something. I watched the object and its large beem of light until it flew out of sight. I have seen a ufo during the day and I know they exsist! I'am pretty sure this was my second sighting.
